description:
Founded in 2012, Master of Project Academy taught 50,000+ IT & Business professionals in more than 170 countries around the world.

Now, Master of Project Academy's exclusive & premium courses are in Udemy!

Learn How to Apply for CAPM (Certified Associate in Project Management) Certificate in 30 Minutes!

Project Management is a very important area in Business and the necessity for Project Managers are growing day-by-day. Employers seek for certifications in the candidates to hire them for Project Management professions. PMI provides most reputable and certifications for Project Management profession: CAPM and PMP. If you do not have a project management experience yet, getting CAPM certificate first and putting a highlight in your resume will bring great opportunities!

By enrolling in this course, you will be able to:

  • Learn how to apply for CAPM with a step-by-step guide
  • Learn importance of CAPM
  • Learn CAPM Certification requirements
  • Learn PMI Audit Process
  • Learn which documents to provide in case of audit
  • Learn CAPM Exam content
  • Get prompt answers & support from the instructor within 24 hours!
  • Participate in active discussions with other CAPM candidates & participants became CAPM and PMP.
  • Get downloadable handouts and materials during course
title: CAPM: How to Apply for CAPM?
